KA.IUHCI.content: such a purpose [re: telos of what seems chaotic play of human affairs] would offer a consoling vision of future > how a philosophical history would interact w/ an empirical history (the latter’s demands are still urgent [Derrida])

source.title: Idea for a Universal History with Cosmopolitan Intent
source.author: KA
